answers.answer: Im going through the same thing. Only im 36 weeks and they said its only hurting me not the baby nd last night they started thinning out my cervix and are starting me on poticin in a few hours! Everything will be fine.

I was doing a lot of research on early delivery etc as I am at risk of preeclampsia also...I'm 31+5 and at this stage our babies have a 90% survival rate if born now. That statistic helped put my mind at ease....each day now closes that small10% gap..I wish you all the best

question: Hi everyone..Im 21 years old, ftm, 31+1 weeks pregnant. I'm in the hospital for the second time in a week. I have been diagnosed with preeclampsia. I'm really scared! All my blood tests have come back good and my little baby girl is doing great. But my blood pressure won't go down. The doctor says that if it doesn't go down she needs to come out early..and that really scares me. Has this happened to anyone else? They gave me medicine last week to help her lungs develop faster..I just hope she will be ok if she has to come out soon.
title: preeclampsia..
